name: mago-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP. If the holder dislikes sweet flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Speed), it will also become confused.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike sweet flavor.

flavor_text.sun-moon: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user’s HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.
